name: Animals Web
description:
Animals is a memorial game for my past and future pets, who shall never be forgotten.

You will play as a hamster, named Eldamar, and you appear in a beautiful forest. Explore the different areas and talk to the other animals! You will see foxes, rabbits, stags, squirrels, ducks, and a horse that will request your help, among more! You will have to help the horse to talk with the Mushroom, a strange and very wise thing...

This game was developed with RPG Maker MV.

Move with the arrows. This is short RPG with minigames, classes and secrets. Enjoy!

Go back to Animals
